page.title: 07BURTON JOYCE-FARMING-PAST
page.content: Mrs.Kilborn came to farm at Bulcote Lodge Farm thirty years ago on 100 acres of land.When her family arrived they had to fill in the midden, dig ditches and straighten the original ridge and furrows so that a tractor could be used.They also planted 120 trees as a windbreak and filled in some ponds.They finished milking 83 Jerseys and Guernseys for financial reasons and began growing barley and rape and keeping a few beef stock. They also keep four dogs, three ponies,a goat and kid,hens (Silkies and Bantams) and 5 cats.
